name: Marine Policy Journal
bio: Leading international journal dedicated to the formulation of marine policy and the study of its effects.

name: Dr. Helena Shaw
bio: Dr. Shaw specializes in renewable energy technologies, market trends, and energy policy analysis within the offshore sector for Offshore Rapport.

name: Jian Chen
bio: Focuses on emerging technologies impacting aquaculture, fisheries, and marine robotics.

name: FAO Contributor
bio: Provides insights based on reports and data from the Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations.
